title: Bongo movie
overview: Bongo is the future of entertainment. We are the first and biggest streaming video-on-demand service in Bangladesh. Bongo boasts an ever growing library of over 15.000 full movies, dramas, TV shows, music videos and songs. This unique collection of Bangladeshi content is available through our website, mobile app and other syndicated video delivery media. Bongo has already been recognized with a top start-up in Bangladesh award and has received acclaim from Silicon Valley and European based investment.
